body.description: The simulated request body of an incoming invocation request.

clientCertificateId.description: A ClientCertificate identifier to use in the test invocation. API Gateway will use the certificate when making the HTTPS request to the defined back-end endpoint.

headers.description: A key-value map of headers to simulate an incoming invocation request.

httpMethod.description: Specifies a test invoke method request's HTTP method.

pathWithQueryString.description: The URI path, including query string, of the simulated invocation request. Use this to specify path parameters and query string parameters.

resourceId.description: Specifies a test invoke method request's resource ID.

restApiId.description: Specifies a test invoke method request's API identifier.

stageVariables.description: A key-value map of stage variables to simulate an invocation on a deployed Stage.
